plants.name: Aningapara
plants.about: It is a tropical species that grows quickly and is easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking it. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Although it blooms in the spring, it is beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones in the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: It adapts well to sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner, without direct sun.
plants.water_tips: On hotter days spray the leaves with water. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Imbe
plants.about: Medium-sized that adapts to different regions, in addition to being very easy to cultivate. It conquers more and more people.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking it. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Saint George Sword
plants.about: The aroma reduces anxiety levels and its scent helps with sleep quality and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the surrounding soil. Water 1 time a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: They are recommended because they are easy to maintain and take care of. You can put them in small vases, or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to the water reserve of these greens, it is always better to water little. Water once a week.

plants.name: Fruits
plants.about: They require a few hours of sunlight a day, so keep them close to windows.
plants.water_tips: Always water the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.about: Brings a sense of tranquility and peace to the environment. It requires little maintenance and is great for those with little space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Require 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violet
plants.about: With delicate flowers. They are great suggestions for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: No watering the flowers and leaves. Water the soil twice a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: The hydrangea is a rustic plant and adapts to different types of soils.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking it. Water once a day.
